languages.text: "Пусть хранится у тебя. Как только мы отыщем аколита Инквизиции — передай клинок ему".

traits.locale_text: "Пусть хранится у тебя. Как только мы отыщем аколита Инквизиции — передай клинок ему".

languages.text: "You should keep it for now. As soon as we locate this acolyte of the Inquisition, you will hand the blade over to him."
languages.original_text: "Пусть хранится у тебя. Как только мы отыщем аколита Инквизиции — передай клинок ему".

traits.locale_text: "You should keep it for now. As soon as we locate this acolyte of the Inquisition, you will hand the blade over to him."
"You should keep it for now. As soon as we locate this acolyte of the Inquisition, you will hand the blade over to him."
"You should keep it for now. As soon as we locate this acolyte of the Inquisition, you will hand the blade over to him."
"You should keep it for now. As soon as we locate this acolyte of the Inquisition, you will hand the blade over to him."

languages.text: “这件物品暂时由你保管吧。等我们找到审判庭的人之后，就把这块刀刃碎片交给他吧。”
languages.original_text: "You should keep it for now. As soon as we locate this acolyte of the Inquisition, you will hand the blade over to him."

traits.locale_text: “这件物品暂时由你保管吧。等我们找到审判庭的人之后，就把这块刀刃碎片交给他吧。”

languages.text: «Quédeselo por ahora. En cuanto encontremos a este acólito de la Inquisición, le entregará la espada».
languages.original_text: "You should keep it for now. As soon as we locate this acolyte of the Inquisition, you will hand the blade over to him."

traits.locale_text: «Quédeselo por ahora. En cuanto encontremos a este acólito de la Inquisición, le entregará la espada».

languages.text: 「今は持っておくといい。異端審問庁のアコライトを見つけ次第、その刃を渡すんだ」
languages.original_text: "You should keep it for now. As soon as we locate this acolyte of the Inquisition, you will hand the blade over to him."

traits.locale_text: 「今は持っておくといい。異端審問庁のアコライトを見つけ次第、その刃を渡すんだ」

languages.text: "Behaltet sie vorerst einmal. Sobald wir diesen Akolythen der Inquisition gefunden haben, gebt Ihr ihm die Klinge."
languages.original_text: "You should keep it for now. As soon as we locate this acolyte of the Inquisition, you will hand the blade over to him."

traits.locale_text: "Behaltet sie vorerst einmal. Sobald wir diesen Akolythen der Inquisition gefunden haben, gebt Ihr ihm die Klinge."

languages.text: « Vous devriez le conserver pour le moment. Dès que nous aurons trouvé cet acolyte de l'Inquisition, vous lui remettrez la lame. »
languages.original_text: "You should keep it for now. As soon as we locate this acolyte of the Inquisition, you will hand the blade over to him."

traits.locale_text: « Vous devriez le conserver pour le moment. Dès que nous aurons trouvé cet acolyte de l'Inquisition, vous lui remettrez la lame. »

languages.text: "Şimdilik sende kalsın. Engizisyon'un havarisini bulunca bıçağı ona teslim edersin."
languages.original_text: "You should keep it for now. As soon as we locate this acolyte of the Inquisition, you will hand the blade over to him."

traits.locale_text: "Şimdilik sende kalsın. Engizisyon'un havarisini bulunca bıçağı ona teslim edersin."
